Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class CLIView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLIView
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class CLIView
extends java.lang.Object
implements View
Class that manages the CLI view

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard​(java.util.ArrayList<User> usersArray, Board board, boolean isShowReachable, int currentPlaying, int indexClient, boolean someoneDead)
      Method called from the VisitorClient every time the clientHandler received an updateBoard message to update and print the users state and the actual board situation
      Specified by:
      updateBoard in interface View
      Parameters:
      usersArray - is the ArrayList of users taking part to the game
      board - is the object Board describe the game field
      isShowReachable - is a boolean that indicates if the printed board has to show the reachable boxes
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the gamer playing in this turn
      indexClient - is the index of the client associated with the player
      someoneDead - indicates if in the previous turn someone has dead

    • askNPlayer

      public void askNPlayer()
      Method called from the VisitorClient of the first player connected when the ClientHandler receives an AskNPlayer message. It's used to ask the number of the players taking part in the game, the number of client the server must wait for before start the game
      Specified by:
      askNPlayer in interface View

    • askPlayer

      public void askPlayer​(int clientIndex, boolean firstTime)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskPlayer message. It's used to ask name and age to the player and then to send this data to the server
      Specified by:
      askPlayer in interface View
      Parameters:
      clientIndex - is the index of the client associated with the player
      firstTime - false if there is another player with the same name

    • askNCard

      public void askNCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cards)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an Ask3Card message. It's received only from the youngest player that used it to choose three cards for all the participants and then to send them to the server
      Specified by:
      askNCard in interface View
      Parameters:
      cards - is the ArrayList of cards name from which the user can choose

    • askCard

      public void askCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cards)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskCard message. It's used by a player to choose his own card and then to send it to the server
      Specified by:
      askCard in interface View
      Parameters:
      cards - is the ArrayList of the cards name from which the user can choose

    • initializeWorker

      public void initializeWorker()
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskInitializeWorker message. It's used to ask to the player in which cells he wants to initialize his two workers and then send this two positions to the server
      Specified by:
      initializeWorker in interface View

    • askWorker

      public void askWorker​(int row1, int column1, int row2, int column2, int currentPlaying, int clientIndex, boolean firstTime)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives for the first time an AskWorkerToMoveEvent message. This method is used by the player to choose the worker to move
      Specified by:
      askWorker in interface View
      Parameters:
      row1 - is the row of the box occupied by the worker 1
      column1 - is the column of the box occupied by the worker 1
      row2 - is the row of the box occupied by the worker 2
      column2 - is the column of the box occupied by the worker 2
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client
      firstTime - indicates if it's the first time the player chooses a worker in the actual turn

    • areYouSure

      public void areYouSure​(int row1, int column1, int row2, int column2, int indexWorker, int currentPlaying, int clientIndex)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives not for the first time an AskWorkerToMoveEvent message. this method is used to ask to the player if he is sure about the worker to move chosen and in case to send an ObjWorkerToMove object to the server , otherwise to recall the method askWorker and permit to the player to make another choice
      Specified by:
      areYouSure in interface View
      Parameters:
      row1 - is the row of the box occupied by the worker 1
      column1 - is the column of the box occupied by the worker 1
      row2 - is the row of the box occupied by the worker 2
      column2 - is the column of the box occupied by the worker 2
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player wants to move
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client

    • otherWorkerToMove

      public void otherWorkerToMove​(int row1, int column1, int row2, int column2, int indexWorker, int currentPlaying, int clientIndex)
      This method is used when the player select a worker that can't move
      Specified by:
      otherWorkerToMove in interface View
      Parameters:
      row1 - is the row of the box occupied by the worker 1
      column1 - is the column of the box occupied by the worker 1
      row2 - is the row of the box occupied by the worker 2
      column2 - is the column of the box occupied by the worker 2
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player wants to move
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client

    • askBuildBeforeMove

      public void askBuildBeforeMove​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskBeforeBuildMove message. It's used to ask if the players with a special god wants to build a block before move and then to send an ObjBlockBeforeMove to the server using the object SenMessageToServer
      Specified by:
      askBuildBeforeMove in interface View
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player wants to move
      rowWorker - is the row of the box occupied by the worker
      columnWorker - is the column of the box occupied by the worker

    • moveWorker

      public void moveWorker​(int row, int column, int indexWorker, boolean isWrongBox, boolean firstTime, int clientIndex, int currentPlaying)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskMoveEVent message. It's used to ask to the player in which position he wants to move his worker and then send to the server an ObjMove message using the object SenMessageToServer
      Specified by:
      moveWorker in interface View
      Parameters:
      row - is the starting row of the worker to move
      column - is the starting column of the worker to move
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player chose to move
      isWrongBox - is a boolean that indicates if the move is wrong
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      firstTime - is a boolean that indicates if this is the first move tried in this turn

    • anotherMove

      public void anotherMove​(int row, int column, int indexWorker, boolean isWrongBox, boolean firstTime, int clientIndex, int currentPlaying, boolean done)
      This method is used by player with special gods that can move more than once to ask if they want to move again
      Specified by:
      anotherMove in interface View
      Parameters:
      row - is the row of the box occupied by the worker
      column - is the column of the box occupied by the worker
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player wants to move
      isWrongBox - is a boolean that indicates if the move is wrong
      firstTime - is a boolean that indicates if this is the first move tried in this turn
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      done - is a boolean used to indicates if the move turn is over

    • wrongMove

      public void wrongMove()
      This method is called when a player tries to reach a box unreachable

    • buildMove

      public void buildMove​(int rowWorker, int columnWorker, int indexWorker, boolean isWrongBox, boolean isFirstTime, boolean isSpecialTurn, int clientIndex, int currentPlaying, boolean done)
      Method used to ask to the player where he wants to build after showing him the reachable boxes
      Specified by:
      buildMove in interface View
      Parameters:
      rowWorker - is the row of the box occupied by the worker
      columnWorker - is the column of the box occupied by the worker
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player wants to move
      isWrongBox - is a boolean that indicates if the move is wrong
      isFirstTime - is a boolean that indicates if this is the first move tried in this turn
      isSpecialTurn - is a boolean used to identify special moves
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      done - is a boolean used to indicates if the move turn is over
